tooltip.kuayue.abc.title: Switches :
tooltip.kuayue.abc.binding.explain.bind_: Press shift + right click to open the gui, use mouse wheel to switch command. Put an Automatic Control Coupling into the slot to trigger Remote Control. While in RC mode, right click the controller can execute all binding block with the given command. The range of RC is
tooltip.kuayue.abc.binding.explain.use_m: In direct using mode, right-click the controllable block can directly control the corresponding action.
tooltip.kuayue.abc.binding.explain.cauti: Caution: Remote control can only be triggered in the contraption state
tooltip.kuayue.acc.explain.text: Press shift + right click to open the gui. Automatic control coupling is capable of binding several different blocks. When a coupling is in effect in a Animatable Block Controller, the controller can control all blocks stored in the coupling at the same time. One coupling could store at most 32 blocks.
tooltip.kuayue.acc.explain.cautions: Cautions : Bounding could only be applied in Contraptions, bindings would be invalid after re-assemble.
msg.kuayue.uncovergence: error : Catenary Fitting Does Not Converge Within The Specified Number Of Steps

msg.kuayue.catenary_excessive_slope: The slope of the given connection is too large.
msg.kuayue.catenary_set_closest_pos: Pos 1 set as the closest point
msg.kuayue.catenary_first_pos_lost: Selected gird in first pos has been removed !
msg.kuayue.catenary_connection_repeat: Selected grids have already been connected !

tech_tree.kuayue.group.ready.node.plasti: Polymer technology means that the player is able to create the synthetic materials necessary for the train.
You're ready to really develop a train.
